name: Verify real-time data updates

steps.name: Given the WebSocket client is initialized
When I connect to the WebSocket server
And I subscribe to order book for "BTCUSD-PERP" with depth 10
Then I should receive order book updates within 5 seconds
And updates should be received continuously

fullName: Crypto.com Exchange WebSocket API - Order Book Data: Verify real-time data updates

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Crypto.com Exchange WebSocket API - Order Book Data
